product_name: Nike Zoom Vomero 9 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Nike Zoom Vomero 9 Trail-Running Shoes offer plush comfort, stability and cushioning on trail runs. Deep flex grooves and articulated crash pads offer natural range of motion and shock absorption. Lightweight sandwich mesh uppers allow excellent airflow to help keep your feet cool and dry. Dynamic Fit technology wraps your midfeet and arches from underneath for a glovelike fit and comfort. Full-length Cushlon midsoles deliver soft yet responsive cushioning and durability. Heel and forefoot Nike Zoom Air units for lightweight, responsive cushioning at heel-strike and toe-off. Nike Zoom Vomero 9 Trail-Running Shoes have soft heel crash pads for impact protection. Deep flex grooves and secondary flex grooves within the Waffle outsole segments improve flexibility, durability and a smooth transition.
short_description: The Nike Zoom Vomero 9 Trail-Running Shoes offer plush comfort, stability and cushioning on trail runs. Deep flex grooves and articulated crash pads offer natural range of motion and shock absorption.
